term_start: TaiwanOn November 3, 2006, his wife and three other high-ranking officials under the Presidential Office were officially charged with corruption for embezzling NTD14.8 million (~USD $460,000) of government funds using forged documents. http://www.tpc.moj.gov.tw/ct.asp?xItem
